short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Easily create monetized links while browsing any of the Collective-supported retailer websites.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Collective Voice’s LinkIt Chrome Extension — It’s a creator's must-have tool to easily create monetizable links while browsing any Collective Voice-supported retailer website!

** Easy one time setup **
- Once you've installed LinkIt Chrome Extension, you can pin it so it'll always appear at the top of your Bookmarks bar (as the green C.V. icon) for easy linking.
- We'll let you know on supported sites when you can create affiliate links to start earning commission!

** Instant time savings **
- When browsing an item, homepage, or category page on any supported retailer website, click the LinkIt icon to automatically generate an affiliate link. You can then copy and share that link anywhere, or add the product to a List for later use.

** Endless opportunities for affiliate earnings **
- Any time you share an affiliate link with your audience, you’re increasing your earnings potential for any sales attributed to that link.

To use the LinkIt Chrome Extension, you must have a Collective Voice account.

Are you a creator and want to take advantage of Collective Voice’s monetization tools? Apply here: https://www.collectivevoice.com
